message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $1,150,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a limited budget and need to make sure it fits within it.
Bob, I understand you have budget constraints, but $900,000 significantly undervalues this product and its potential.  To make this work, I can go as low as $1,100,000. This is my final offer.
I understand that the product has value, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $1,050,000. This is my final offer.
